title: Bachelor star Davey Lloyd pleads guilty to drink driving
text:
Bachelor In Paradise's Davey Lloyd was charged with drink driving at Manly Local Court on Wednesday and disqualified from driving for three months.

According to The Sunday Telegraph, the 29-year-old was arrested and taken to Dee Why Police Station on September 2, after being pulled over by the police on Pittwater Road, Warriewood, at 10.10pm for a random breath test.

'I'm very sorry and it will never happen again. I will use this time wisely to reflect,' said Davey outside of court on Wednesday after pleading guilty.

Bachelor star Davey Lloyd was charged with drink driving at Manly Local Court on Wednesday and disqualified from driving for three months. Pictured: Davey at a Maxim party in 2016

Following a date with girlfriend Georgia Cook on September 2, Davey said he had no idea he was over the limit after consuming four drinks over three hours.

'I had four but they were actually 1.8 standard drinks. It was by accident and I never knew that. But it's so easy to be misled,' he said.

He pleaded guilty to middle range prescribed concentration of alcohol (PCA) of 0.114, which is more than double the legal limit of 0.05.

Scandal: According to The Sunday Telegraph , the 29-year-old was arrested and taken to Dee Why Police Station on September 2, after being pulled over by the police on Pittwater Road, Warriewood, at 10.10pm for a random breath test

Regret: 'I'm very sorry and it will never happen again. I will use this time wisely to reflect,' said Davey outside of court on Wednesday after pleading guilty

Alongside the three month driving ban, carpenter Davey was also fined $850.

According to The Sunday Telegraph, the magistrate 'ordered Davey's vehicle to be fitted with an alcohol interlock device for 12 months'.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Davey's rep for comment.

Law: Alongside the three month driving ban, Lloyd was also fined $850 and 'ordered Davey's vehicle to be fitted with an alcohol interlock device for 12 months'. Pictured: Davey in 2018

Davey first found fame on The Bachelorette's first season in 2015, where he failed to find love with suitress Sam Frost.

He later appeared on Bachelor In Paradise's first season in 2018, and returned to the show earlier this year for the second season.

In May, he debuted new girlfriend Cook after leaving Paradise single again.
